projects.name: Expense Manager

projects.name: Digital Medical Diagnosis
projects.label: Python-Django
projects.description: It is a software that solves real-time problems and helps the users to get to know about their diseases and their severities. A user just has to upload an image of his her X-ray and the software is built in such a way that It can recognize its corresponding results
